item.title: Why I love sports so much
item.description: So recently, while cleaning my house, I discovered that I currently own more pairs of sport shoes than regular shoes. This made me realize how important sports are for me.

item.title: Review - Personal Trainer Luc Ludkiewicz
item.description: Fitness has always interested me. I've been doing it on and off for about 2 years now but wasn't getting the results I wanted. So I've decided to hire a Personal Trainer.
